sources.title: Sunset on the Desert
sources.description: Title: Sunset on the Desert Summary: Roy is mistaken for a bad guy expected by the local outlaw gang. He goes undercover to pin the goods on the bad guys. Just as he is about to do so, the real bad guy shows up. Directed by: Joseph Kane Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 1 April 1942 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Judge Kirby is being blackmailed and forced to let outlaws go free. He was once the partner of Roy's father and when Roy reads in the paper that he is in trouble he heads out to help him. Arriving, Roy quickly realizes he has been mistaken for one of the outlaws and is not wanted in town. However he stays, and now posing as that outlaw, hopes to learn who is causing all the problems.

sources.title: Sunset on the Desert
sources.description: Roy is mistaken for a bad guy expected by the local outlaw gang. He goes undercover to pin the goods on the bad guys. Just as he is about to do so, the real bad guy shows up.

sources.title: Sunset on the Desert (1942) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Lynne Carver
Director: Joseph Kane

Roy is mistaken for a bad guy expected by the local outlaw gang. He goes undercover to pin the goods on the bad guys. Just as he is about to do so, the real bad guy shows up.

metadata.Plot: Judge Kirby is being blackmailed and forced to let outlaws go free. He was once the partner of Roy's father and when Roy reads in the paper that he is in trouble he heads out to help him. Arriving, Roy quickly realizes he has been mistaken for one of the outlaws and is not wanted in town. However he stays, and now posing as that outlaw, hopes to learn who is causing all the problems.
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Lynne Carver
